    "content": "# Runway ML Prompts - Copy & Paste Ready
## All 19 Scenes Optimized for Gen-3

**Quick Start:** Copy prompt → Paste in Runway ML → Generate → Download

---

## Scene 1: Chaos (0-3s)
**Duration:** 3 seconds
**Motion:** Fast spin, chaotic

```
Hyperrealistic 3D application icons including Gmail, Google Photos, Dropbox, Facebook, Instagram, Calendar spinning chaotically in a dark digital void, glitching and fragmenting, dramatic cinematic lighting, motion blur, overwhelming sensation, particles flying, 8K resolution, photorealistic CGI
```

**Camera motion:** Spinning, disorienting
**Style reference:** Think Marvel logo intros

---

## Scene 2: Freeze (3-6s)
**Duration:** 3 seconds
**Motion:** Slow, dramatic pause

```
3D app icons frozen suspended in mid-air in dark void space, dramatic single beam of light cutting through darkness from above, floating particles, cinematic pause moment, photorealistic rendering, volumetric god rays, 8K resolution
```

**Camera motion:** Slow push in
**Style reference:** Interstellar aesthetic

---

## Scene 3: Quest 3 Reveal (6-10s)
**Duration:** 4 seconds
**Motion:** Slow elegant rotation

```
Meta Quest 3 VR headset emerging from beam of light, rotating slowly in 360 degrees, sleek white and black design with soft blue glow from lenses, premium product photography style, dramatic cinematic lighting, floating in void, photorealistic 8K, Apple keynote commercial quality
```

**Camera motion:** Orbital rotation
**Style reference:** Apple product reveals

---

## Scene 4: Frustration Split Screen (10-15s)
**Duration:** 5 seconds
**Motion:** Handheld, restless

```
Cinematic split screen: left side shows young professional frantically scrolling through smartphone apps with stressed expression, right side shows laptop screen with 20+ browser tabs open and cluttered desktop, both sides showing chaos and frustration, modern office lighting, shallow depth of field, photorealistic, shot on ARRI Alexa, 8K
```

**Camera motion:** Slight shake, restless
**Style reference:** Social Network editing style

---

## Scene 5: Data Fragmentation (15-20s)
**Duration:** 5 seconds
**Motion:** Floating, surreal

```
Abstract surreal visualization: photographs trapped inside literal floating cloud, emails contained in floating vintage filing cabinets, documents scattered as flying papers in wind, all disconnected in vast digital space with blue tint, Inception-style impossible architecture, dramatic cinematic lighting, photorealistic CGI, 8K resolution
```

**Camera motion:** Slow drift through space
**Style reference:** Inception dream sequences

---

## Scene 6: Data Exploitation (20-25s)
**Duration:** 5 seconds
**Motion:** Upward flow, dramatic

```
Dramatic cyberpunk visualization: streams of personal data including photos, text messages, and videos flowing upward as glowing light streams toward massive corporate server buildings with tech company logos, golden dollar signs materializing in the air, individual user standing small and dark below receiving nothing, dark cyberpunk aesthetic with neon accents, cinematic wide shot, photorealistic, 8K
```

**Camera motion:** Tilt up following data streams
**Style reference:** Blade Runner 2049

---

## Scene 7: Isolated User (25-30s)
**Duration:** 5 seconds
**Motion:** Slow push in

```
Cinematic dramatic shot: young professional sitting alone at modern desk, surrounded by multiple glowing computer screens and mobile devices creating blue light, overwhelmed defeated expression, dramatic side lighting creating shadows, dark moody atmosphere, photorealistic, Denis Villeneuve cinematography style, shallow depth of field, 8K resolution
```

**Camera motion:** Slow dolly push in
**Style reference:** Arrival, Blade Runner 2049

---

## Scene 8: Putting on Headset (30-35s)
**Duration:** 5 seconds
**Motion:** Slow motion, dramatic

```
Epic cinematic slow motion: professional hands carefully picking up Meta Quest 3 headset, determined person putting it on their head, dramatic lighting from below creating heroic silhouette, lens flare from side, inspirational moment, shot on ARRI Alexa camera, film grain, photorealistic, 8K resolution
```

**Camera motion:** Slow motion, static with push
**Style reference:** Christopher Nolan moment

---

## Scene 9: Entering VR Universe (35-40s)
**Duration:** 5 seconds
**Motion:** FAST forward motion

```
First-person POV through VR headset lens, starting in complete darkness then massive explosion of light and vibrant colors, beautiful digital universe materializing with floating holographic data structures forming, tron-style glowing grid extending to infinity in all directions, volumetric lighting, spectacular visual effects, photorealistic CGI, 8K resolution
```

**Camera motion:** Accelerating forward rush
**Style reference:** TRON Legacy, Ready Player One

**⭐ THIS IS A KEY SCENE - MAKE IT SPECTACULAR**

---

## Scene 10: Photo Gallery in VR (40-45s)
**Duration:** 5 seconds
**Motion:** Slow glide through

```
Breathtaking VR environment: hundreds of photographs floating in perfect 3D spatial arrangement, creating visible timeline stretching into distance, each photo glowing with soft ethereal light, can see through transparent space between them, volumetric god rays piercing through, museum-quality gallery lighting, photorealistic CGI rendering, 8K resolution
```

**Camera motion:** Smooth glide forward through gallery
**Style reference:** Museum galleries + sci-fi

**⭐ ANOTHER KEY SCENE - MUST BE BEAUTIFUL**

---

## Scene 11: Flying Through Timeline (45-50s)
**Duration:** 5 seconds
**Motion:** VERY FAST forward

```
Dynamic camera movement flying forward rapidly through 3D timeline of photographs, years visible as large floating numbers (2020, 2021, 2022, 2023, 2024), hundreds of photos streaming past like stars in hyperspace, intense motion blur, arriving at glowing section labeled Christmas 2023, spectacular visual effects, photorealistic, 8K resolution
```

**Camera motion:** Fast forward flight
**Style reference:** Star Wars hyperspace jump

---

## Scene 12: AI Assistant Appears (50-55s)
**Duration:** 5 seconds
**Motion:** Materialization, graceful

```
Beautiful holographic AI assistant materializing in VR space, elegant feminine form composed of flowing light and data streams, translucent blue-white glow, raising hand in graceful gesture as photographs arrange themselves in response to her movement, cinematic science fiction aesthetic, photorealistic CGI, 8K resolution, inspired by Her movie and Cortana from Halo
```

**Camera motion:** Slow orbit around assistant
**Style reference:** Her (2013), Blade Runner 2049

**⭐ KEY SCENE - NEEDS TO BE ELEGANT**

---

## Scene 13: Family Tree (55-60s)
**Duration:** 5 seconds
**Motion:** Slow reveal, pull back

```
Stunning 3D family tree visualization in VR space, photographs of smiling family members at each node connected by glowing golden light lines, organic tree structure extending in all directions like constellation, warm golden and blue lighting creating emotional atmosphere, connections pulsing with light showing relationships, beautiful and touching, photorealistic CGI, 8K resolution
```

**Camera motion:** Pull back to reveal full tree
**Style reference:** Cosmos (Neil deGrasse Tyson)

---

## Scene 14: Money Reversal (60-65s)
**Duration:** 5 seconds
**Motion:** Reverse flow, triumphant

```
Powerful dramatic visualization: data streams with glowing dollar signs and currency symbols flowing from large AI company server buildings downward toward individual user in center, digital money counter rapidly increasing on screen ($5, $10, $15, $20, $25...), user with satisfied smile as passive income accumulates, triumphant heroic lighting, cinematic, photorealistic, 8K
```

**Camera motion:** Tilt down following money flow
**Style reference:** Financial graphs + superhero landings

---

## Scene 15: Phone Notification (65-68s)
**Duration:** 3 seconds
**Motion:** Static close-up

```
Extreme close-up shot of modern smartphone screen showing notification: Hypernet logo with text 'You earned $22.47 this month from AI data access', hand holding phone with satisfied expression visible blurred in background, natural modern lighting, product photography style, photorealistic, 8K resolution
```

**Camera motion:** Slow push in on phone
**Style reference:** Apple iPhone commercials

---

## Scene 16: Global Scale Vision (68-75s)
**Duration:** 7 seconds
**Motion:** EPIC zoom out

```
Epic spectacular zoom out: single VR user becomes hundreds of users, then thousands, then millions spread across the view, creating massive beautiful network of glowing light connections spreading across Earth visible from space, interconnected web of blue and gold glowing nodes covering continents, breathtaking scale, cinematic space photography style, volumetric atmosphere, photorealistic, 8K resolution
```

**Camera motion:** Continuous accelerating zoom out
**Style reference:** Planet Earth from space documentaries

**⭐ EPIC FINALE SCENE - GO BIG**

---

## Scene 17: Remove Headset (75-80s)
**Duration:** 5 seconds
**Motion:** Slow, intimate

```
Cinematic intimate shot: young professional carefully removing Meta Quest 3 headset with both hands, amazed joyful expression with slight smile, making direct eye contact with camera, holding headset at chest level, dramatic Rembrandt lighting from side, shallow depth of field with b
... [truncated]
